Package model

Interface Field

public interface Field
Interface Field represents field of simulation. Field controls all actions of cells.

  • Method Details

    • getFieldSize

      int[] getFieldSize()
      Returns:
      weight and height of field

    • setCellCoordinates

      void setCellCoordinates​(Cell cell, int[] coordinates)
      Places cell to given coordinates
      Parameters:
      cell - cell to place
      coordinates - coordinates to place cell

    • getCellCoordinates

      int[] getCellCoordinates​(Cell cell)
      Parameters:
      cell - required to search
      Returns:
      coordinates of given cell

    • deleteCell

      void deleteCell​(Cell cell)
      Parameters:
      cell - cell to delete from field

    • updateField

      void updateField​(Generation generation)
      Update field with new generation of bots
      Parameters:
      generation - generation of bots to place on field

    • getCell

      Cell getCell​(int[] coordinates)
      Parameters:
      coordinates - coordinates where located sought cell
      Returns:
      cell on given coordinates

    • getSurvivedBots

      Bot[] getSurvivedBots()
      Returns:
      all survived bots on field

    • executeCommand

      void executeCommand​(Bot bot)
      Execute command from DNA of bot on current pointer address
      Parameters:
      bot - bot which command must be executed

    • step

      void step​(Bot bot, byte direction)
      Make one step
      Parameters:
      bot - executor of command
      direction - direction, relative to bot

    • grab

      void grab​(Bot bot, byte direction)
      Grab food or convert poison to food
      Parameters:
      bot - executor of command
      direction - direction, relative to bot

    • look

      Cell look​(Bot bot, byte angle)
      Parameters:
      bot - executor of command
      angle - direction, relative to bot
      Returns:
      cell located in the desired direction on the adjacent cell to the bot

    • rotate

      void rotate​(Bot bot, byte angle)
      Parameters:
      bot - executor of command
      angle - direction, relative to bot

    • convertPoisonToFood

      void convertPoisonToFood​(int[] coordinates)
      Convert cell of type poison to cell food-type cell
      Parameters:
      coordinates - coordinates of poison cell to convert
